
HQ Migration Usage: hq-migrate.sh/hq-migrate.bat [COMMAND] [OPTIONS]...

Commands: 

 * hq-export
 * hq-import
 * one-step-migration

Options:
 
  * hq-export: 
    * -Dstaging.dir=<path> (optional, defaults to <HQ_MIGRATE_HOME>/tmp/export-data) 
    * -Dhqserver.install.path=<path>
    * -Dscale=true (optional, default to false)
    or 
    * -Dsetup.file=<path>
  
  * hq-import 
  	* -Dhqserver.install.path=<path>
  	* -Dexport.archive.path=<path>
    * -Dstaging.dir=<path> (optional, defaults to <HQ_MIGRATE_HOME>/tmp/export-data) 
    * -Dquiet=<true|false> (optional, defaults to false)
    * -Dscale=true (optional, default to false)
    * -Dtarget.database.username=<super user name> (optional, override of the hq-server.conf#server.database-user)    
    * -Dtarget.database.password=<super user password> (optional, override of the hq-server.conf#server.database-password)
    or 
    * -Dsetup.file=<path>
   
  * one-step-migration:
    * -Dsource.hqserver.install.path=<path>
    * -Dtarget.hqserver.install.path=<path>
    * -Dstaging.dir=<path>
    * -Dscale=true (optional, default to false)
    or 
    * -Dsetup.file=<path>
